roleset.name: be a pirate, steal
roleset.note: PIRATE-V NOTES: The arg structure is predicted by class membership, but because of thelimited meaning of the verb, I doubt arg0 or arg2 would ever appear. (from pirate.01-v)

example.name: the one example
example.text: [Any secret]-1 can be pirated [*-1], the experts said, if it is transmitted over the air.
example.arg: if it is transmitted over the air
